Package com.kneelawk.kmodlib.client.blockmodel

Interface UnbakedModelLayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
UnbakedBottomTopModelLayer, UnbakedColumnModelLayer, UnbakedCTLayer, UnbakedCubeAllModelLayer, UnbakedCubeModelLayer, UnbakedModelRefModelLayer
public interface UnbakedModelLayer
An unbaked model layer.

    Description
    static final com.mojang.serialization.Codec<UnbakedModelLayer>
    CODEC
    The codec for encoding and decoding all unbaked model layers via KBlockModels.BLOCK_MODEL_LAYER_REGISTRY.

  • Field Details

    • CODEC

      static final com.mojang.serialization.Codec<UnbakedModelLayer> CODEC
      The codec for encoding and decoding all unbaked model layers via KBlockModels.BLOCK_MODEL_LAYER_REGISTRY.

  • Method Details

    • getCodec

      com.mojang.serialization.Codec<? extends UnbakedModelLayer> getCodec()
      Returns:
      the codec registered with KBlockModels.BLOCK_MODEL_LAYER_REGISTRY.

    • getModelDependencies

      Collection<net.minecraft.util.Identifier> getModelDependencies()
      Returns:
      the identifiers of the models this model layer depends on.

    • setParents

      void setParents(Function<net.minecraft.util.Identifier,net.minecraft.client.render.model.UnbakedModel> modelLoader)
      Used for collecting all the unbaked models this model depends on.
      Parameters:
      modelLoader - a function for retrieving unbaked models by their id.

    • bake

      @Nullable @Nullable BakedModelLayer bake(net.minecraft.client.render.model.Baker baker, Function<net.minecraft.client.util.SpriteIdentifier,net.minecraft.client.texture.Sprite> textureGetter, net.minecraft.client.render.model.ModelBakeSettings rotationContainer, net.minecraft.util.Identifier modelId)
      Bakes this unbaked model layer to a BakedModelLayer.
      Parameters:
      baker - the baker supplied to this model.
      textureGetter - the texture getter for this model.
      rotationContainer - the rotation container for this model.
      modelId - the model id of this model.
      Returns:
      a baked model layer, or null if an error occurred.
